titleStmt.title: The case of William Gutteridge, and other glass-makers, against passing a pattent for incorporating Sir Joseph Herne, and others, by the name of the glass-makers in the cities of London and Westminster, and ten miles compass of the same
titleStmt.author: Gutteridge, William, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
